House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07874
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING THE SCHOOL HEALTH AND SAFETY OFFICE IN EVERY PUBLIC SCHOOL IN THE COUNTRY, PROVIDING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Establishes the School Health and Safety Office (SHSO) which shall be primarily responsible for the supervision and operation of the school canteen, school nutrition program, immunization campaigns, campus security, and many other related non-teaching roles and functions.
ALIAS NAME : “School Health and Safety Act of 2018.”

DATE FILED : 2018-06-19
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
